name: Color Hunt
description: Discover the newest hand-picked color palettes of Color Hunt. Get color inspiration for your design and art projects.

name: Open Color
description: An open-source color scheme, optimized for UI. My go-to resource to choose colors from scratch.

name: UI Gradients
description: Collection of beautiful color gradients for you to choose from and export to your project.

name: Tailwind Colors
description: This an excellent and popular set of color pallettes by TailwindCSS. Get beautiful colors of all shades

name: Color Contract Checker
description: This an excellent site to check whether contrast of two colors is good or not

name: 0to255
description: 0to255 is a color tool that makes it easy to find lighter and darker colors, or tints and shades, based on any color.

name: Coolors
description: Coolors is the essential tool for creating color palettes. It generates perfect matching colors in seconds.

name: HTML Color Picker
description: This is a color picker by w3schools which provides different shades of colors based on your requirements. It also gives Hex and RGB value of color.

name: UI Color Picker
description: A color picker that contains different shades of solid colors & gradients. Which can be used in any kind of projects.

name: FlatUI Colors
description: FlatUIColors is a color palette designed for user interface design.

name: MaterialUI
description: In Material UI color website you can find different shades of colors plates. It also provides Hex and RGB value of color.

name: ColorMagic
description: ColorMagic is an AI color palette generator. Generate colors by entering the keyword into the textbox.

name: ColorPick Eyedropper
description: ColorPick Eyedropper is an eyedropper & color picker that allows you to select hex codes of the colors from webpages.

name: Colorion
description: Colorion is an immersive color palette generator and exploration tool that inspires creativity. With a wide range of beautiful combinations, it offers endless possibilities for designers and artists. Discover stunning palettes and elevate your designs with Colorion.

name: Happy Hues
description: NNot sure what colors to use in your designs or where to use them? Happy Hues is a color palette inspiration site that acts as a real-world example of how the colors could be used in your design projects.
